posts.post_content:
Hey all, looking to trade my '48 Leaf Honus Wagner for T206 HOF, also willing to consider off-back commons (possibly a few of them depending on the back). Sorry if this is better off in a different section.

I can't figure out how to imbed the image, so here's my reddit post about it: [url]https://www.reddit.com/r/baseballcards/comments/u9nyeq/ft_1948_leaf_honus_wagner/[/url]
